title: Pop-Up Buttons AND Active Cooling?! - Black Shark 3 Pro Durability Test!
description: Its not very often that we find a smartphone doing something NEW. This Black Shark 3 Pro has a few new bells and whistles. Last years BlackShark two was missing a headphone jack, but this 3 Pro even brought that back. But does the Active cooling system even work? Do the pop up bottons pop up? The only way to find out for sure is with a durability test. Its time to see how the Black Shark 3 Pro gaming phone holds up.
